title: Spike Feresten and Paul Zuckerman
description:
You don't want to miss this show. Spike Feresten is a comedy writer, car collector, TV producer and the host of the podcast "Spike's Car Radio" along with his good friend and co-host, Paul Zuckerman. They have both owned (and own) a lot of cars, and sometimes buy one together. They're both incredibly funny, knowledgeable, and opinionated; About cars and everything else. 

https://www.podcastone.com/spikes-car-radio

 

Follow us!

T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @spikeferesten @zuckerman

IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman  @spikeferesten @zuckerman

 

Watch the show!: https://youtu.be/IATlXEx--7M
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
